line.text: %PLAYER%: We've won, Professor Xavier, but Emma's been taken prisoner by Apocalypse. What kind of experiment could he be working on that he needs Emma, Polaris and Quicksilver?
%ProfX%: I don't know, but I feel our time is running out. At least the Madri temple has been disbanded. When you're ready to leave, use the portal Blink has created. Come and see me when you return.
